message: I'm willing to share the majority of the money with you, Bob. Let's get this over with quickly!
Alice, your offer was far too generous to yourself. Let's be fair - I'm proposing a 60/40 split in my favor.  Take it or leave it, but remember the money shrinks each round!
Bob, I understand your perspective, but I think a 55/45 split is a more fair compromise considering the inflation. Let's come to an agreement and avoid further losses.
Alice, we're running out of time and money!  I'm countering your offer with 58/42. This gives you a bit more than my last offer, but reflects the fact that I'm losing value faster with each round.
Bob, we're both losing a lot with each round. Let's split the money evenly and avoid further losses. This is the most sensible way forward.
